description:
Discuss the solution Verizon came up with to integrate a COTS product (Oracle Siebel) into the DevOps pipeline leveraging Git and Jenkins and why it’s important to Verizon’s overall SDLC digitation journey.

Delivered by Neeraj Garg & Todd Gonzales
title: Jenkins World 2016 - Lightning Talk #3: Verizon's Journey to Enterprise Grade DevOps
